amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the EPA Hazardous Substance Superfund by $114 million and reduce NASA funding by an equal amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by transfer) for the hazardous substance superfund account by $114,716,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 309 (Roll no. 454).
